summary: THE HANDLE USED TO RECLINE THE FRONT SEATS HAVE BOTH BROKEN OFF.  THE PASSENGER ONE BROKE OFF FIRST AND "FORTUNATELY" IT WAS STILL UNDER WARRANTY.  WHEN I WAS AT THE DEALERSHIP, I NOTICED THERE WERE FOUR OTHER CHEVY BLAZERS IN THE SAME DAY WITH THE SAME PROBLEM.  SEVERAL MONTHS LATER THE DRIVER'S SIDE HANDLE BROKE OFF.  IT IS NOT UNDER WARRANTY AND THE DEALER REFUSES TO FIX THIS PROBLEM. TS
